Designers

The Cupcake Design Kit is a living, breathing document that contains all of our visual assets (components, iconography, color palettes, grids, etc).

1. Download the Kit

Go to the Cupcake Design Kit repo and click on the latest version of the Design Kit.

  • Download Default Sketch File
  • Download BD Flavor Sketch File

2. Using the Kit
